task.summary: Default task
initial commit
initial commit
updated readme
initial styling
updated styling
updated styling, added option to delete basket items
update total price calculation on deletion of items, handed over TLD to proxy.php to allow deletion of items on NA platform
fixed bug with deletion of items
fixed bug with deletion of items
prepend instead of append body to fix display issues
* updated basketUpdate after deletion of items
* added translations * refactored code
* added translations * refactored code
* added more translations * refactored code * added some styling
* updated style for smaller screens * qunatity indicator on cart now updates on "add to basket"

* fixed display of correct appearance in basket * forced SpreadShop basket to be removed when spreadshop is loaded to prevent displaying two carts at the same time * moved config in separate file so that the cart can be implemented easily on any page w/o having to include the shop/config in any page. The assumption is, that there is only one cart that should be displayed everywhere
* fixed deletion of items. items can be deleted in custom basket and will be deleted from the "real basket" as well
* hiding basket button for spreadshop also via css not only js
* added missing spreadCart_config file

* when all items have been deleted from within the basket and then the basket was closed, the empty basket window was opened. * the current fix addressed this issue by merging the empty basket and the filled basket into one wrapper. The update basket content method now decides what needs to be displayed
* accidentally commented "type:post" out that leads to not working deletion of basket items
* added new shopless.html to show usage w/o having to load the shop
* added new shopless.html to show usage w/o having to load the shop
* added new shopless.html to show usage w/o having to load the shop
* reverted changes from last 2 commits
* added option to make each basket item available 100 times
* make it actually working
* removed the sucess from the deleteItem function. Somehow "success" was never fired even though the basket update worked. Therefore the updateBasketContent function executed.
* changed proxy so that sucess get's fired.

* implmented a number field so the user can enter the qunatity he likes * works and alters the basket * missing/not yet done: ** basket shows "empty" after change of quantity - refresh of page solves this issue ** localStorage is not updated * I commited these changes as a template for the node.js implementation in a "work in progress" stage
* problem of empty basket is solved * total is updated when adding items * total is updated when adding items * open problems: ** quantity counter is somehow broken right now. need to check in detail
* fixed bug of quantity display in basket icon. problem was mising conversion from string to int
* added mock for coupon application. as soon as the basket relies on the API instead of the spreadshop basket, it will also display the correct numbers (I guess)
* implement read option in proxy.php and make it work with refactoring of the rest of the project
* implemented proper handling of the .xml part of the json response
* took over implementation from jtlapp:master
